title: Chanca Piedra | Supports Urinary Tract Health | AOR
description: AOR's Chanca Piedra supports urinary tract, kidney, gallbladder and liver health with an effective dose of this traditional botanical.
cleaned_text: Chanca Piedra Support urinary tract health* - Supports which translates as "stone breaker", provides the right support when it comes to the health of the kidneys, gallbladder and liver. This supplement is rooted in ancient medicinal practices. In the U.S., approximately 12% of the adult population suffers from kidney stones and up to 15% are affected by gallbladder stones. While there is no way to completely avoid these ailments, leading a health. formula optimizes the health benefits provided by this powerful herb natural, Piedra contains Phyllanthus niruri in Ayurveda to help support a healthy urinary tract.* AOR guarantees that all ingredients have been declared on the label. Made without wheat, gluten, corn, nuts, peanuts, sesame seeds, sulfites, mustard, soy, dairy, eggs, fish, shellfish or any animal by-product. Take one capsule daily with or without food, or as directed by a qualified health care practitioner. Note: Product appearance, odor, and taste may vary from lot to lot due to the use of natural ingredients. Consult a health care practitioner prior to use if you are pregnant or breastfeeding, if you have diabetes, or if symptoms persist or worsen. Do not crush, blend or mix the capsules. Swallow the capsule whole. Keep out of reach of children. *These statements have not been evaluated by the Food and Drug Administration. This product is not intended to diagnose,
